The Silvery Moon Tavern.name: The Silvery Moon Tavern
The Silvery Moon Tavern.desc: This is a simple tavern with a bar and several tables. To the south is a door to the outside. To the north is the kitchen. Up is the inn.

Silvery Moon Inn 1.name: The Silvery Moon Inn
Silvery Moon Inn 1.desc: You are in a hallway with a door on your right and left. There is a stairway down to the tavern. The hallway goes north.

Silvery Moon Inn 2.name: The Silvery Moon Inn
Silvery Moon Inn 2.desc: You are in a hallway with a door on your right and left. The hallway goes north and south.

Silvery Moon Inn 3.name: The Silvery Moon Inn
Silvery Moon Inn 3.desc: You are in a hallway with a door on your right and left. The hallway goes south.

Main Street 0.name: Main Street
Main Street 0.desc: A cobblestone street with a street lantern

Main Street -1.name: Main Street
Main Street -1.desc: A cobblestone street with a street lantern

Main Street 1.name: Main Street
Main Street 1.desc: A cobblestone street with a street lantern
